projects.title: MARO Cognitive Security Platform
projects.summary: Contributed to a cognitive security platform reducing human risk through behavioral modeling and policy enforcement.
highlights: Developed JavaScript-based clickjacking detection logic for browser extension UI protection
Built robust pytest suites supporting stable CI/CD deployments via GitHub
Engineered API workflows using Python and SQL for real-time behavioral data processing
Collaborated cross-functionally with engineering, product, and design teams

projects.title: Incident Response Program Maturation
projects.summary: Assisted Sony Pictures Entertainment in maturing IR capabilities through automation and process refinement.
highlights: Supported IR events across corporate and subsidiary environments
Developed incident response playbooks and knowledge base documentation
Implemented new alerts and detection controls with Threat Intelligence teams
Collected and analyzed forensic data during active incidents
Focused on automation to improve IR response efficiency

projects.title: CSULB Cybersecurity Club Leadership
projects.summary: Established and led campus cybersecurity community, driving engagement and CTF participation.
highlights: Managed club operations and organized CTF competition participation
Implemented strategies to enhance member engagement and collaborative learning
Built inclusive environment fostering hands-on cybersecurity skill development
Currently leading 100+ members in security research and competitions
